text: Hatun Usnu (Quechua hatun big, usnu altar; a special platform for important celebrations, "big usnu", also known as Qatun Ushno de Toccto) is an archaeological site in Peru on a mountain of the same name (Jatunhosno). It is located in the Ayacucho Region, Huamanga Province, Chiara District.Gobierno Regional de Ayacucho, Plan de Desarrollo Turístico de la Región Ayacucho 2004 – 2014, Aprobado mediante Ordenanza de Consejo Regional N° 03 - 04 - GRA/PRESescale.minedu.gob.pe - UGEL maps of the Huamanga Province, Ayacucho Region == References == Category:Archaeological sites in Peru Category:Archaeological sites in Ayacucho Region Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Mountains of Ayacucho Region
title: Hatun Usnu
